”Alexa ask T. I. S. automation for Registration code.”
”Alexa ask T. I. S. automation to Turn on lamp”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. i. s. automation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We TIS works on getting connected with ALEXA, Just simply asked by voicing out your command and there you go.

No need for tapping on your screen to get it done. You can get through it easily and controlling your home lighting, Air condition, Curtain, scenes, security system, TV, DVD and music just simply ask and we got it for you.

It is smart and simply amazing...

To get started, you should go to TIS Portal page ( http://alexaconfiguration.tissmarthome.com ) and create account as member. Then go to the SETTING page and add your address subnet ID, Device ID, Channel Number to match your room lights, Air condition, security system, music, TV, DVD, RGB Color and Moods. and ask Alexa by this command "Alexa open T.I.S. for registration code", to get your registration code that need save to last table of SETTING page.

Now you should say "Alexa, T.I.S" to be ready for home automation, Alexa responses "yes", then just directly Tell what you like as the following skills. 

Lighting control :
Dim Spot-Lights to 50%.
Turn Off kitchen lights.

Color Control :
Set Living room R.G.B. color to Blue.
Change Living room Background color to dark red.

Moods/Scenario :
Good morning.
Party Scene.

Air condition :
Set master Spilet Temperature to 24.
Turn off Robin AC.

TV, DVD etc :
Turn On Living room TV.
The TV Volume raise.

Security :
Set security to Away with Password (****).
Disarm security with Password (****).

Music :
Garden Player play a music.
Next song of music player.

Curtain :
Open master curtains.
Close the saloon curtain.

Find more information about connecting TIS Smart Home devices to Alexa at http://alexaconfiguration.tissmarthome.com/node/help
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
